original: 'dod gsol smon lam dgongs 'dus rta nag gi pad+ma dbang chen 'don pa bsgyur pa ni /
analyzed: dod gsol smon lam dgongs du rta nag gi pad+ma dbang chen don ba sgyur ba ni

original: lha yi lha mchog 'jam dpal gshin rje'i gshed :
analyzed: lha yi lha mchog jam dpal gshin rje gshed

original: dus rnams rtag tu khro rgyal khyod sgrub ste :
analyzed: dus rnams rtag tu khro rgyal khyod sgrub ste

original: srog gi phyir yang yi dam mi spong na :
analyzed: srog gi phyir yang yi dam mi spong na

original: ye shes thugs rje'i spyan gyis gzigs su gsol :
analyzed: ye shes thugs rje spyan gyis gzigs su gsol

original: khro rgyal 'khor bcas khyod kyi gzi byin gyis :
analyzed: khro rgyal khor cha khyod kyi gzi byin gyis

original: bar chad dgra bgegs tshhogs rnams bsal nas kyang :
analyzed: ba chad dgra bgegs tshhogs rnams bsal nas kyang

original: byams pa'i zhal bzang dngos su bstan pa dang : bsgrubs pa'i 'bras bu dus 'dir bstshal du gsol :
analyzed: byams ba zhal bzang dngos su ston ba dang sgrub ba bras bu dus dir bstshal du gsol

original: yang 'bri gung gnam lcags me 'bar gyis mdzad pa'i /
analyzed: yang bri gung gnam lcags me bar gyis mdzad ba

original: bskal pa dpag tu med pa'i sngon rol nas //
analyzed: bskal ba dpog tu med ba sngon rol nas

original: lha mchog khyod dang smon lam lhan cig btab //
analyzed: lha mchog khyod dang smon lam lhan cig debs

original: da lta zhal mthong yi dam lhar gsol na //
analyzed: da lta zhal mthong yi dam lhar gsol na

original: snying po byang chub mchog la mi gnas tshhe //
analyzed: snying po byang chub mchog la mi gnas tshhe

original: tshhe rabs 'khor ba gar skye gar gnas kyang //
analyzed: tshhe rabs khor ba gar skye gar gnas kyang

original: rjes su zungs shig bcom ldan gshin rje'i gshed //
analyzed: rjes su zungs shig joms ldan gshin rje gshed

original: dngos grub stshol cig bcom ldan gshin rje'i gshed //
analyzed: dngos grub stshol cig joms ldan gshin rje gshed

original: bar chad sol cig bcom ldan gshin rje'i gshed //
analyzed: ba chad sol cig joms ldan gshin rje gshed

original: dgra bgegs sgrol cig bcom ldan gshin rje'i gshed //
analyzed: dgra bgegs sgrol cig joms ldan gshin rje gshed

original: sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub bstshal du gsol //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub bstshal du gsol

original: kun mkhyen zil gnon drag rtshal gyis mdzad pa'i /
analyzed: kun mkhyen zil gnon drag rtshal gyis mdzad ba

original: mkhyen brtshe nus mnga' 'jam dpal dpa' bo yis //
analyzed: mkhyen brtshe nus mnga jam dpal dpa bo yis

original: bstan pa rgyas dang de 'dzin tshhogs rnams kyi //
analyzed: ston ba rgya dang de dzin tshhogs rnams kyi

original: sku tshhe phrin las skye dgu'i bde skyid la //
analyzed: sku tshhe phrin las skye dgu bde skyid la

original: bar du gcod pa thams cad zlog tu gsol /
analyzed: ba du gcod ba thams cad zlog tu gsol

original: khyad par rig 'dzin bdag cag dpon slob dang // yon mchod 'khor dang bcas pa ma lus pa'i //
analyzed: khyad ba rig dzin bdag cag dpon slob dang yon mchod khor dang cha ba ma lus ba

original: sngon las 'phral rkyen las byung dgra bgegs gdon //
analyzed: sngon las phral rkyen las byung dgra bgegs don

original: nad rims dbul phongs 'thab rtshod zlog tu gsol //
analyzed: nad rims bul phong thab rtshod zlog tu gsol

original: phyi nang drang srong dmod pa byad mthu dang // byur dang skal ngan mi shis dus min 'chi //
analyzed: phyi nang dren srong dmod ba byad mthu dang byur dang skal ngan mi shis dus min chi

original: keg sri langs sogs chag che nyam nga ba'i //
analyzed: keg sri ldang sogs chag che nyam nga ba

analyzed: gal rkyen ba chad thams cad zlog tu gsol

analyzed: phrin las chad lhag dam rdzas ma tshhang nyams

analyzed: snyen sgrub g.yel zhing dus kyi mchod ba chag

analyzed: dzin ma gsal gsang sngags sgra nyams sogs

analyzed: sdig sgrib nyes ltung ma lus chags ba bgyid

analyzed: tshhe dpal stobs byor dbang phyug phun sum tshhogs

analyzed: jam mgon kun bzang tshhe dir mngon gyur shog
